223514196.body:
$LK  
The keys question are: 
What are the number from their financial report?    
Are they going to bankrupt?   
 
Case study:  $USAT got pumped from $7 to $9.  On the delisted day of Sep 26th, 2019 the stock went down to $4. On the next few days after delisted it went up back to $7.   
 
If they are not going to  file bankrupt, there is nothing to worry from yesterday entries. 
 
If Lu's got removed after the EGM, the company for sure to release the ER to get the new investors.   
 
The company already done the hardest park of launching, and marketing.   This is the multibillions dollar industry and can expand to outside of China, and the big sharks (International and Chinese Sharks) can not wait for Lu being kicked out.
